column3: Traffic Signal Timing Change for Albany Rd at Tates Creek Rd:
column4: Currently, both sides of Albany Rd proceed at the same time.

column3: Traffic Signal Timing Change for Albany Rd at Tates Creek Rd:

column3: Traffic Signal Timing Change for Albany Rd at Tates Creek Rd:
column4: This will enhance safety and allow for more efficient left turns to inbound Tates Creek Rd.
